com.radaee.pdfex

Interface PDFView.PDFViewListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    PDFView

    public static interface PDFView.PDFViewListener
    Interface for view operations listener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFound(boolean found)
      fired when find returned
      void onInvalidate()
      fired when the view need redraw.
      void onOpen3D(java.lang.String file_name)
      fired when a 3D object to be opened.
      void onOpenAttachment(java.lang.String file_name)
      fired when an attachment to be opened.
      void onOpenMovie(java.lang.String file_name)
      fired when a movie to be opened.
      void onOpenSound(int[] paras, java.lang.String file_name)
      fired when an audio to be opened.
      if paras[0] == 0 means formatted audio file (mp3/wav/midi/...)
      void onOpenURL(java.lang.String url)
      fired when an URL link to be opened.

      fired when page NO.

      fired when a page displayed in view.

      fired when text selection displayed.

      fired when text selected.

      fired when long pressed, and start text selection.

        void onSelDisplayed(PDFView.PDFSelDispPara para)
        fired when text selection displayed.
        Parameters:
        para - x1, y1: first char left-top coordinate for selection
        x1, y1: last char right-bottom coordinate for selection

      • onSubmit

        void onSubmit(java.lang.String target,
            java.lang.String para)
        Parameters:
        target - "http:" header or "mailto:" header, and so on
        para -
        mail mode: return whole XML string for form data.
        other mode: url data likes: "para1=xxx¶2=xxx".
